title: 79/355/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 March 1979 exempting the Kingdom of Denmark from applying to certain species Council Directive 70/458/EEC on the marketing of vegetable seed (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 20 March 1979  exempting the Kingdom of Denmark from applying to certain species Council Directive 70/458/EEC on the marketing of vegetable seed  (Only the Danish text is authentic)  (79/355/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 March 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 225, 12.10.1970, p. 7. (2)OJ No L 236, 26.8.1978, p. 13.
